abstract: Supreme Court considers whether people held in immigration detention have right to bond hearings while their cases are being processed; justices are aware that questions of due process in determining length of detentions are especially relevant given Pres-elect Donald J Trump's proposal for mass deportations.

headline.print_headline: Immigrants in Jail Put Rights Case to Justices
headline.main: Supreme Court Weighs Jailed Immigrants’ Right to Periodic Hearings

snippet: The number of these detainees is likely to swell if President-elect Donald J. Trump follows through on his pledge to deport millions of unauthorized immigrants....
lead_paragraph: The number of these detainees is likely to swell if President-elect Donald J. Trump follows through on his pledge to deport millions of unauthorized immigrants.
